content: Which American city is famously known as 'The Windy City'?

Chicago is famously known as 'The Windy City.' The nickname is believed to have originated due to the city's location on the shores of Lake Michigan, which often brings in strong winds. However, there are other theories suggesting that the name might also refer to the city's politicians being full of hot air. But regardless of its origin, Chicago has embraced this moniker and it's now widely recognized around the world.
